Module com.alike
Package com.alike.graphsystem

Class GraphGenerator

java.lang.Object
com.alike.graphsystem.GraphGenerator
public class GraphGenerator extends Object
Class contains functionality to generate StaticGraph objects of certain types or with certain properties.

  • Method Details

    • generateRegularPolygonalGraph

      public static StaticGraph generateRegularPolygonalGraph(int numCorners) throws InvalidGraphException, NodeSuperimpositionException
      Uses parametric equations to retrieve points on a circle to generate regular polygonal graphs.
      Parameters:
      numCorners - The number of corners our regular polygon will have.
      Returns:
      StaticGraph A new graph containing nodes arranged in the shape of a polygon.
      Throws:
      InvalidGraphException - Thrown if the @code{numCorners} parameter is less than 3.
      NodeSuperimpositionException - Thrown if an attempt is made to superimpose another node.

    • generateIrregularPolygonalGraph

      public static StaticGraph generateIrregularPolygonalGraph(int numCorners, int radiusX, int radiusY) throws InvalidGraphException, NodeSuperimpositionException, RadiusExceedingBoundaryException
      Generates points that lie on an ellipse to create an irregular polygon.
      Parameters:
      numCorners - The number of corners the polygon will have.
      radiusX - The maximum coordinate in the x direction.
      radiusY - The maximum coordinate in the y direction.
      Returns:
      tspGraph A @code{StaticGraph} that contains new nodes arranged as an irregular polygon.
      Throws:
      InvalidGraphException - Thrown if the input numCorners is less than 3.
      NodeSuperimpositionException - Thrown if an attempt is made to superimpose a node.
      RadiusExceedingBoundaryException - Thrown if an attempt is made to stretch a polygon outside the display area.

    • generateRandomGraph

      public static StaticGraph generateRandomGraph(int numNodes, boolean generateRandomEdges)
      Used to generate a random StaticGraph object with randomized node positions and randomized edges (if needed).
      Parameters:
      numNodes - The number of nodes the random graph must have.
      generateRandomEdges - Whether the method should output a graph with randomized edges already assigned.
      Returns:
      g A new randomized StaticGraph object.

    • generateRandomDynamicGraph

      public static DynamicGraph generateRandomDynamicGraph(int numNodes, int nodeSpeed, boolean randomMovement, boolean vectorMovement)
      Creates a Dynamic graph with randomized values.
      Parameters:
      numNodes - The number of nodes the output graph should have.
      nodeSpeed - The speed the nodes of the graph should have when moving.
      randomMovement - Whether movement on the graph should include random movement.
      vectorMovement - Whether movement on the graph should include movement by velocities.
      Returns:
      dg A new dynamic graph with random node starting locations and random starting velocities.
